channel.title: 602 SkillTab EXP Wont work

item.title: 602 SkillTab EXP Wont work
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

make sure it’s refreshing the skill/resfreshingskillxp in playerassistant?

Read full topic

item.title: 602 SkillTab EXP Wont work
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Zotic Sir Zotic
item.description:
@Sir_Zotic wrote:

I have added this 602-skill-tab. It work fine the interface. But having 1 problem that i cant figure it out… When i log in with level 3 account. IT showing me Attack Level 1 with EXP 14000000. When i gain few level it still showing me 14000000. Anyone know how to fix the XP?

Here are the code

RsInterface.java

[code]public static void NewSkillTab(TextDrawingArea[] TDA) {
RSInterface Interface = addInterface(31110);
setChildren(104, Interface);
